website_summaries.verdict: Above average quality at a very reasonable price, but these traditional moccasins may take some getting used to.
pros: Durable quality from a well-established manufacturer
Features an attractive suede upper with a cozy faux fur lining for warmth
Rubber sole is dainty yet tough enough to withstand some outdoor use
cons: Materials require a short breaking-in period – may feel a bit small at first

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! I purchased these and starting to wear them and the toebox ripped after 3 to 4 wears. The problem was I didn't start wearing them until after the return window passed. I have no recourse to get new ones. I've had the same brand in black and have worn them for years with no problems. Maybe since I bought those at a department store they were better quality. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: LS1125

customer_reviews.title: My favorite slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned quite a few pairs of Minnetoka slippers over the years and they are my favorite shoes for around the house and out on short dry outings. These are the first black ones I have perchased and they are extremely cute! They are just as expected in style and comfort. I usually wear between a 6 1/2 and a 7. I bought the 7 they do seem a bit smaller than my last pair. They are a bit too tight and are slightly uncomfortable, Yet from previous perchases I believe they will stretch to a more comfortable size. Quality and style are great though!
customer_reviews.author: Kia.

customer_reviews.title: Wear down too fast!
customer_reviews.text: I generally love Minnetonka, but I am very disappointed with these Slippers. First of all, the fit on the upper part of the slipper was very loose. I had to pull the shoelace very tight to get them to stay on my feet. I purchased them at the end of September 2017 and as of this writing (Dec 8), they have lost all support, the faux fur is practically gone and the bottoms are flat. Yes, I admit that I wear them every day in the house, but 2+ months! I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These should have been exactly what I got in the store previously but they are nothing like that. They have no support, are bigger than expected and more stiff. I think these are a brand RIP off actually. I am so disappointed. Not worth 10$ much less 40$ with tax. Don't buy these, go to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after less than two months!
customer_reviews.text: this is my fourth pair of these same sippers and I typically find they last me over a year before they need to be replaced but after less than 1.5 months the toe has started opening up. I don’t even wear these daily and have never had this happen before. Hope it’s a fluke but these are too pricey to be literally falling apart in less than a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: James Long

customer_reviews.title: Not real Minnetonkas - ripped along seam after only 1 month of wear.
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a gift from my husband for Christmas. We've been away for January-February, so after only one month of wearing these both slippers ripped along the seam in the back. I don't know where Amazon gets these from, but they must not be real Minnetonka slippers, I've never had problems with Minnetonkas in the past. It's too late for me to return them now, but DO NOT buy these, they must be cheap knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: LJK

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, were too long
customer_reviews.text: The stone color is neutral beige, a very nice color as expected. The leather is sturdy, pliable, and better quality than lower-priced shoes I've purchased, as is the fuzzy interior. I wear 8.5 and the 8.5 in this brand fit more like a 9 wide. These would fit if I wore socks all the time. I returned for an 8 and hope they fit better. No specific arch support, but the footbed seemed comfortable (not a gell type footbed). I question the sole; it's thin, glued-on rubber-like, not stitched.
customer_reviews.author: DeeMad17

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed, questioning if these are real minnitonka brand. I ordered these and within a month the sewing on the side completely fell apart. They are unwearable. I had a pair of these in high school 7 years ago and they last me 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoe advertised
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, the shoe in the photo is not the shoe they send. After placing my order, the confirmation showed a pic of a different shoe, which I think is the right shoe for the description. I wanted the first shoe shown & tried to make the order 3 times before deciding to take my chances, waiting to see which shoe showed up. It wasn’t the one shown in the original pic. I tried the moccasins on anyway & although they were my size they were too small. Wish I knew how to get the one advertised because it’s really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Arrow

customer_reviews.title: Poorly crafted
customer_reviews.text: First off I wanted to say that I LOVE how these slippers look and feel. They are super comfy and I love wearing them. However they are poorly constructed. A few weeks ago I notice that the leather in the heal was completely torn right before the stitching. I've only have these for 4 months. They should last much longer than that, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Starts snug, but stretches out with use.
customer_reviews.text: These fit right at first but eventually stretched a bit and the inside lining got packed down. They are comfortable and true to size. I like the sole on the bottom for when I run out to grab the mail, also adds some resistance so I don’t slip on carpeted stairs. The string come untied often though. They aren’t long enough to double not. I will be putting a dab of glue on the knot to make it stay.
customer_reviews.author: SmalltownMomma

customer_reviews.title: ... my wife for xmas because she needed a new nice pair of slippers
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my wife for xmas because she needed a new nice pair of slippers. These are very well made and very warm. Her only complaint is that where the leather overlaps the top and the fir inside stops a little too short the back seems to run the back of her foot a bit. I'm hoping with wearing them the leather will soften up and not be as harsh against her skin. Other than that minor quirk they are the nicest slippers shes owned.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Washam

customer_reviews.title: I love these slippers but the right size eludes me
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers but the right size eludes me.. Started with a size 9 (I'm a standard size 9 in sneakers) but they were too big (flopping off my heels, even with my socks on). I prefer bare feet in furry footwear, which amplifies the problem. Then I returned and ordered the 8. They are verrrry snug. I'm currently trying to decide if I should keep wearing them in hopes that they stretch, or return for something else given that they are too small. A half size would be perfect.... I do have narrow feet, but still wear regular sizes.
customer_reviews.author: HBW

customer_reviews.title: Worn out in a month - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this brand for years. But for Xmas I got a cheap target brand moccasin and it lasted me thru April before they were worn out as I wear them as a house slipper. Those cost me $10 These I received April 26th and I’ve worn less than a month as today is may 15th and they are slitting at the seems and the tie loops have broken already and I ordered them a touch large so it’s not that they are too tight. I’m very disappointed that this really pricey slipper has such poor quality! I wish I could return them. The leather and wooly inside is comfortable but I’d it doesn’t last what’s the point?
customer_reviews.author: Blondebell

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, I love the look and I love the furry feel on your toes but I hate returning things and these are cut way way way too wide and I always order 8 1/2 wide but these are crazy wide and floppy off the heels. I even have swollen feet right now and I still cannot wear them at all. HUGE! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: Warm and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these moccasins, but they run just a bit short. I have been a perfect size 8 for about 55 years, so I'm well acquainted with how long size 8 shoes need to be. I was going to return them, but a full size larger would nave been too long. I finally decided to keep them and hope they would stretch out a bit. They have done that, and I truly love them, but they're just not quite true to size. I bought a pair of them for my husband . He wears a 10 1/2, so I bought him size 11. They're perfect. So I guess they're a half size off.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Simon

customer_reviews.title: Blew out in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had these right at 4 months and worn them quite a bit, if not daily then close to it. These split on the outer upper edge where the top that covers the toe box meets the side. On closer inspection, this was probably a quality control issue--- the stitching to hold the 2 pieces together was probably either lower quality and therefore weaker or the seam was trimmed too close to the edge. I've worn this brand for years and this is my third pair. I won't buy another. Usually get 4 years/pair. Four months is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large!
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I ordered was my correct shoe size. This pair ran about Two sizes to big. Returned for a smaller size and still extremely large. The sizing is way off with these. I returned the second pair also and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn them a total of 3 times and the outer sole is already peeling off! I've worn them no where extraneous, either. Extremely disappointing. Size wise: I'm a size 8.5 and originally ordered a 9 which was very big, returned them for a size 8 and it's a little tight around the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelai

customer_reviews.title: Came Untied... :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved these moccasins... loved then. I even bought a second pair in a different color. That being said.... One moccasin came untied. I can not replicate the bow in the moccasin. It's ridiculous. I had to just tie a knot. I can no longer wear them out, which makes this expensive moccasin worthless. Had this moccasin not come untied, making them worthless, I would have given it a MUCH higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: V. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but loose
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The first, purchased 3 years ago, was the same size and was a little snug but loosened up to a perfect fit. This pair came, same style and size, and were a little too loose and constantly slips off my heels when walking. I had to pull the leather straps tighter and re-tie them. Now the leather strap doesn't stay tied. Grrr....
customer_reviews.author: Annette Carstens

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a good brand. I had high hopes for a slipper that fit when I saw the wide width. It only comes in whole sizes and I'm usually an 8.5 wide so I ordered a 9 wide. The width seemed ok but they were too short. Totally unexpected and I sent them back. There was no way I was ordering another whole size up. I'm looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Unraveled in the toe
customer_reviews.text: I had received a red pair of these as a Christmas gift and decided to buy another pair, but these had managed to unravel in the toe area in less than two months of wear. They had fallen apart quite quickly. The shoes are soft and cute, but I can’t find myself spending more money on a pair that’s going to break that easily and for what You pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Sent them back
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, they were soft, warm, cozy, fit even with a thick pair of socks on and seemed like they would be comfy to walk in. Then I actually walked in them. My left shoe was fine, but the right one felt like there was a strip right up the middle, from heel to toe, that had my foot sort of wobbling as I walked. Like maybe the sole was a V shape on the bottom. Granted I would only wear them around the house to keep my feet warm, but I have plenty of ankle issues without adding another to the bunch, so these went back.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: Sad fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe until the box toe on right shoe split at the seam.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA S KENNARD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying, sadly
customer_reviews.text: These ended up being too wide. I slightly tightened the laces, though I know they are probably meant to be decorative, and that seemed to help a bit. However, now multiple of the loops holding those laces broke. I wouldn’t recommend buying. They don’t hold up and don’t fit well. Also, while soft and warm at the beginning, after a few weeks of wearing, they do not feel cozy any longer. I’m bummed! I was hoping these would be a nice, long-lasting option!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Not "barefoot" comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be uncomfortably stiff and narrow. BUT, I'm a barefoot enthusiast who has lived in Vibrams all summer. Furthermore, I think my arch has fallen somewhat during my recent pregnancy, and I now have the problem that if I don't spread my toes a little to flex the arch, my foot hurts when I walk (plantar fasciitis?). The toe boxes on these are pretty standard as shoes go and were consequently horribly uncomfortable for me. For anyone in my shoes (haha), I recommend Soft Star Shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: I tried more than one size of slipper. My regular shoe size is 8W in women's. I tried everything from 7 regular to 8 wide and all of them were too big...mostly in length. This is the first time I've found any shoe that was too big across more than one size. I'll look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: cat mom

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever
customer_reviews.text: These are true Minnetonka slippers! I know sometimes buying on amazon you might end up with a ripoff but these are legitimate. I love them because I feel comfortable enough to wear them to work on dress down day without it appearing too much like a slipper. I like to think of it as the more dressed up slipper. They keep up very well, the only reason I have to buy them as often as I do is because I either lose them or my dog eats it. Super comfy, beautiful, and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Minnetonka.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Minnetonkas. They hold up extremely well, are comfortable, warm (but not overwhelming) and fit to size. I’ve bought 5 now, one for my sister because she loves them too now. I wear them everyday, I know they are practically slippers, but they are so comfortable that I wear them frequently. With everyday use they begin to break down about a year in. But not the soles, more like the understandable things. The fabric and such. But I’m also going places in them versus just indoors. Overall, super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JoyfulSelah

customer_reviews.title: 2016 and they are terrible (writing this review on 2/2/16)
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of minnetonkas lasted about 4 years. I bought these around Jan 12, 2016 and they are terrible (writing this review on 2/2/16). The soles are not the same quality material as my first pair and are ripping and leaving black pieces all over the floor. I have not worn them outside; just on my carpet and wood floors. I'm extremely disappointed as I was hoping to have another great pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: angela crandlemire

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not that comfy and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are kind of awkwardly shaped at the top but still cute and I’ve worn them for not even twenty minutes around the house and they already ripped at the top. The toe box is kind of awkward and tight. It’s a shame because they are cute, but I bought other pairs of moccasins off Amazon for half the price that lasted months before they needed to be retired so it’s kind of a disappointment :/
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers to replace Mom's previous pair that she's been using for a couple years. They were identical except for the color. The old ones were falling apart, but she loved them so much, she kept wearing them. When she got these for mother's day, I told her her they were for the colder months, but she insisted on wearing them for that night anyway. She's 68, and gets around just fine. She doesn't need arch support to find them comfortable. For her they are perfect, but everyone has different feet.
customer_reviews.author: MC Oddslice

customer_reviews.title: Good slipper
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear LL Bean slippers, which I have found have no match anywhere. These, however, are a close second at a fraction of the cost. They don’t provide a ton of arch support, but they’re comfortable and have a memory foam bottom that hasn’t flattened out yet. I found that putting them through the washer and dryer do tighten them up after wearing for awhile. All in all, I’m pleasantly surprised with what I received for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship😖
customer_reviews.text: Let me begin by sharing these shoes are my fav. Very comfortable. Love the look. That being said. I received these Jan 2, 13 DAYS ago! I bought two pair, brown and red. I wore the brown almost exclusively for the first 3 or 4 days. Today I find a hole in the toe and stress points at the seam. Poor craftsmanship and crazy for $50!!!! Wow Minnetonka, up your game!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Ran big, but all good after an exchange.
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 7, sometimes 7.5 depending on the brand. I ordered a 7.5 based on reviews. They were fitting ok with gym ankle socks on, and with no socks, my heels slipped out, and I knew this material would eventually stretch. So returned for the 7. They came and I've been wearing for about 3wks now: The were snug in a good way with socks, and fit great without. As suspected, they have already stretched a bit but still perfect. They are so cozy and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: K.A.S

customer_reviews.title: Buy from Walmart!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this slipper!! There is something under the center part of heel into the arch area. It’s maybe excess fabric? It’s only the one slipper and I feel like I’m trying to walk on a balance beam with my right foot. It’s causing me to twist my ankle to the side when walking. I’m not happy!! 🤬I could have gone to Walmart and paid $19 for this kind of quality!! Will not buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. I bought them to replace my old pair which were the same brand. You gotta Wear them a few times to mold them to your feet but after a few wears they fit perfect and comfortably. Only down side is I have had them for a month and they look so dirty. Black shows everything and I do yard work in them. I will probably get a brown pair again soon before the brown hid the dirt and I refuse to put on real shoes to work outside.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of Minnetonka slippers. They are soft, warm and comfortable. I forgot that they stretch a little. I ordered a size 9 and they fit perfectly out of the box but after a few days they were a little loose. I wear them like shoes all day because I love comfort and they’re cute too. If you’re going to wear them a lot like I do then you might want to size down a little. My last pair were a size 8 and I still wear those too. Now I have a pair for home and a pair at my dads for when I visit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sole great for nonslip and preventing excess wear
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and plush inside, sole great for nonslip and preventing excess wear, however the actual slipper is not well made despite the nice feel. A hole developed at the toe wear the seam runs within 3 months of purchase, and they had by no stretch of the imagination received heavy use (worn maybe 3-4 times a week during the cold months, only for a couple of hours each time while in the house in the morning). Liked the shape, style and feel, but for the price would have wanted a little more sturdiness with them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love Minnetonka moccasins. Love these. Slippers, fur lined, small sole. Perfect. I wear these inside and outside. Took on last cruise, and perfect. Wear as shoes or slippers. And warm, especially with socks. My last pair i had about 6 or 7 years and getting a bit worn. Very comfortable. Benny, out 1.5 yr old husky rescue....also likes them.....and pulled out and chewed up the leather strap. These still fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a size 10. ALL my shoes are size 10. It was too big. I had to buy a size 9.5. Others reviewed that fit good, but mine were too big. Shipped quickly. I love the color and the soft inside. The souls are durable and thick. I could wear them outside, but they are my indoor slippers. There isn't too much arch/foot support. They're not like a sneaker, but they are comfy. Glad I got them
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: Sixes run wild
customer_reviews.text: The first set of these I ordered an eight as I take a 7 1/2 and they run small. Pretty tight. Then I ordered another set for my sister, she wears an 8 so I ordered a 9 and they’re way too big. She is keeping them but wears socks with them. The item I ordered had a design on the front, are but not as pictured. I received solid brown color.
customer_reviews.author: rossanne cook

customer_reviews.title: Can make slight size adjustments with leather band.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to my expensive Uggs, since I frequently run in and out of the garden with my slippers on. Originally ordered my usual size 8, but had to exchange for the size 9. Now they are too big/wide, but I realized that being a moccasin, I could pull the leather string and shrink them up a little. Without socks, they aren't as comfortable as I would like, but they will definitely serve the purpose and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: kcrawford

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this Cally Slipper.
customer_reviews.text: There is something about this Cally Slipper, I absolutely love it. So comfortable, fit as expected. This is my second pair. I wore my first pair to shreds. You can slip them on/off so easy. They have the rubber bottom in case you need to run into the garage or outside for a minute. I washed my other pair in the washing machine a bunch of times too which was awesome. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: CallMeKenzi

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at ALL!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these moccasins August 20th.I wore them maybe 2 weeks in September and today. I went to put them on this morning and my toe went through the top!!! The entire stitching came out around the top!! I wouldn’t recommend these.This is my second pair and after comparing the stitching- these do not look stitched near as well as my first pair. I’m now trying a new moccasin as I’m sure I won’t get my money back or hear from the company about exchanging them and making this right. Hopefully this other moccasin holds up longer than the Minnetonkas,which I thought was a good brand. I give 2 stars only because they came quickly and were packed nice.
customer_reviews.author: pamela temchack

customer_reviews.title: Slippers may run bigger than your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.text: The slippers were a gift to family member. Normal shoe size was ordered but was one size to big. Return was east. Ordered the next smaller size (7.5 down to a 7.0) They were received and fit perfectly. Best thing is that there was no hassle in returning them. Great slipper. I give it 5 stars for comfort. It did not matter if size was a little off.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boothman

customer_reviews.title: Way too big & badly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my usual size and they were too big. As in a size and a half too big. Couldn't even begin to judge the possible comfort levels because of sizing issues. Two stars for the look of them and the fact that they look well constructed. Packaging was horrible. Original shoe box was simply placed in a plastic mailing bag and shipped that way. Consequently the shoe box was torn, ripped, dented and the slippers were crushed and flattened upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Mora

customer_reviews.title: Love these slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I received my slippers today much earlier than expected!! Thank you sooo much!! The colors are so stunning in person and the pattern is much nicer in person. Fed Ex delivered this morning, they are a real good service. I am so impressed with this slipper and it’s quality of faux fur. I plan to be getting a lot of use with these taking care of our two year old toddler grandson in Florida. Keep supplying us with these quality affordable shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Infinity

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit, had to pay to return
customer_reviews.text: i purposely bought these because they came in sizes instead of s-m-l as some slippers do. I was disappointed that they were way too long. They weren't very comfortable and had a very thin sole. I returned them and was charged $15.00 to return them. I paid 42.97 with the tax and was refunded 27.97. I am very disappointed in the slipper but even more disappointed in Amazon. I always look on Amazon first for anything, I've learned my lesson. BTW I found the same slippers in my local shoe store for $24.00
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these when I first got them. They looked great & felt great, but they don’t wear well. I have only had these for a couple months & they look horrible. Both of the ties on the top came undone & you can’t just retire them, they look terrible if you try. They are so stretched out & look like I have had them for years. For the price, they aren’t worth it. I have had cheaper ones that have lasted a lot longer. Very disappointed which sucks b/c I really did love them at first.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ribley

customer_reviews.title: Order one size down if in doubt
customer_reviews.text: These moccasins are super cute and extremely comfortable. Totally unisex and able to wear outside, which is awesome! The reason I gave 4 stars is because they stretched after wearing a couple of times. Rather annoying. I recommend ordering one size down and wear with a thick sock for a few times to break in. Other than that, perfection!
customer_reviews.author: san50

customer_reviews.title: size problems
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size, and the same as another pair, different style, of Minnetonka's I had, but they were too small and were not going to stretch as I wore them enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Schlater

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart within a day
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way these look and feel however it hasn’t even been 24 hours since delivery and the one slipper has already started to fall apart. I’m so disappointed I was nervous about buying these because of all the reviews about them falling apart I should have known I was not going to be the exception.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffyy227

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite brands
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many pairs of the Minnetonka Brand. I love all of the styles but this one seems different. It is shorter and wider. The sole is much smaller than the shoe. Just didn't seem the usual quality I've come to expect from Minnetonka. Hope the difference is just this style or maybe just this one pair.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Ooops, previous review was for wrong purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely well made and the dark navy color is spot on, these are not what I was looking for. First of all, I usually wear a 9.5 to 10, so based on other reviews, I got a 9 but they're still somewhat big. Secondly, these are more like bedroom slippers than a moccasin so I can't wear them for running errands as intended. The top front of the shoe barely covers just my toes. Overall a good purchase for these were a good purchase for the price but not what I
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: These mocs pair fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I always wear these mocs as my house slippers. The pair I ordered most recently fell apart at the top sticking - because there wasn't enough fabric there for the stitching to hold - in less than a month. Again - I only wear them as house slippers and usually get about a year's worth of wear from a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W

customer_reviews.title: Love the slipper, love the color.
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 7. I bought a size 7. They fit. I like to wear thick wool socks with these and the first day they were a little snug on my toes, but now they are very comfortable. The tie does take a bit to get them snugged down enough so they stay tied, just use a little muscle and pull them tight and they should stay. I would definitely suggest to buy these, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but low quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband gifted me these slippers for Christmas. After 2-3 months of only wearing them in the house, they started to fall apart. Here we are 5 months later, and the right slipper in particular is literally coming apart at the seams. I'm super disappointed since I thought Minnetonka was a trusted brand - "Exceptional Footwear Made with High Quality Materials for a Luxurious Look and Feel. Footwear Hand-Made with the Finest Materials for Durability & Timeless Style." Apparently Minnetonka has a "1-year warranty against any manufacturer defects in materials or workmanship on all products. The warranty does not apply to normal wear and tear." Wondering if this is considered "normal wear and tear"??
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good moc, good price, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, comfort and good construction these. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that I have a narrow heel and they slip off a bit if I am not wearing socks. But I guess that is on me, can't fit everyone perfectly and I am thinking of heel inserts. But the mocs have the drawstring type of leather thong running around the shoe so that they can be tightened somewhat around the foot, that has helped. I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: TWIGGY

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but maybe not for flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: These are super warm and comfy. But not too warm for springtime hardwood floors. The only issue I had was that they are so loose on the sides. I’m flat footed and they sorta spill out on the sides. But they don’t slip of my feet when walking and they’re pretty cute so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: raquel adams

customer_reviews.title: Thin sole
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the W width because I wear a half size and felt a full size larger would be too big. The W width was too big. The heel was really wide. Soles are flimsy and I like to wear them to the mail box etc. returned. I ordered the mule style I always get in my true size.
customer_reviews.author: Margie DB

customer_reviews.title: Nice mocs!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well made mocs. I find them à bit short of what normally fits my feet but the half size larger might have been too big. We adjusted the width using the leather ties. It takes 30 minutes to warm the leather so they better form to my feet and they do keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dokami

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I grew up wearing Minnetonka and loved each pair I ever owned. I'm disappointed that these did not live up to my expectations. I have only had since Feb and only wore in the cold months (so not from June-Sept). I started wearing them again in Nov and after a total of 5 months of wearing them, there are rips on the seams. The strings broke the day I got them when I attempted to tighten them a little. I will not be buying another pair after this. Apparently quality isn't what it use to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L Burzycki

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear these because I can’t keep them on my feet. I wear a size 8 so that’s what I ordered; I wore them a few times and really wanted to love them because they’re so soft inside. But because they’re so low cut and maybe a little to big, they kept coming off while I was walking, so I don’t wear them. I tried a half-size smaller in a store, and they stayed on better but felt too tight around my toes. So they’re going to Goodwill. Maybe someone can wear them...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite slippers. I have worn many different brands and these are by far my favorite and I refuse to buy any other. These keep my feet warm, easy to put on and take off, and SO COMFY!
customer_reviews.author: Cayce VanWhy

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed. I have a the Blakely-braided slipper and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I have a the Blakely-braided slipper and I love them. But this shoe looks similar, but is cut too high in the back and it hits my heal bone and rubs it. The Blakely-braided shoes are cut significantly lower on the heal and I wear those shoes every day. If you don't have a bony heal, you should be fine. Some shoes are worth breaking in, but not house shoes. What a shame. I am returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Mommalovie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed & overcharged :(
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these aren’t really what I was expecting. I’ve been buying Minnetonka’s for years and these are made differently. The color is off, the back bulges out to a square corner and has some sort of sewn on flap (the normal minnetonkas are rounded at the heal), and something is weird in the front of the shoe that scrapes against my pinky toe. To add insult to injury, I saw the normal Minnetonka moccasins at Famous Footwear for $15 less! I would return them for a refund if it wasn’t so inconvenient to do so.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two months
customer_reviews.text: Received these moccasins in October, only wore them indoors and, by December, they had a hole along the stitching where the top fabric meets the side fabric. A read a few reviews that this had been an issue, but had hoped that things would be different in my case. I returned them to Amazon and received a full refund. Very sad because they were quite cute.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got the minitonka's Cally before in color pink. They were so comfortable; wore them every day. I then ordered them in different colors: red, black and tan. The tan's were as expected and replaced my dirty pink ones. The blank and red, however, do not look or feel similarly. They are not lined as nicely and evenly; they both run small/so uncomfortable. I don't know if these are made by hand else they feel like seconds or knock off. Just sayin...they are going back to seller.
customer_reviews.author: FV&DL

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good looking slippers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have purchased for my mother. She lives out in the country and likes to wear them outside to sweep her deck and to putter around in her garden. They hold up extremely well and she won't even look at any other brand! Extremely satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Gale Wolgamot

customer_reviews.title: Little snug
customer_reviews.text: These are just a little snug for a 10, but I'm hoping they'll stretch a little within a month or so. Overall they're nice quality. They did send me the wrong color though, and I needed them the next day so I unfortunately didn't have time to exchange
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these years ago and liked them. When it was time to upgrade a different pair of slippers earlier this year, I bought these again since my first pair of Minnetonkas was still going strong. They have changed these since my first purchase and not for the better. They look and feel cheap and the fit is not anywhere near the same. These were promptly returned.
customer_reviews.author: V!

customer_reviews.title: Wide Width available? No.
customer_reviews.text: States available in wide widths but upon receiving my 8.5 wide it is just a regular width. No wide label on the box. Fortunately I sized up enough that my mom can wear them comfortably. But she has a D width foot. Great slipper otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought it was too loose but was able to tighten it and they were so darn warm and comfortable! I mostly wore these around the house and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a pair of moccasins and finally went ahead and ordered it. I was mostly concerned if I should have sized up or not and decided to order my regular size. At first I thought it was too loose but was able to tighten it and they were so darn warm and comfortable! I mostly wore these around the house and a few times outside. They are fine for making errands or walking short distances but aren't great if you plan on being in them outdoors for long periods of time. The sole isn't as great so it's not comfortable for walking outside on hard concrete floors but they are ideal indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Davina

customer_reviews.title: Just as I remembered
customer_reviews.text: As a teenager in the 1050's, I used to get Minnetonka beaded moccasins at the lodge in June Lake, CA. Loved them then and like the new slippers. I think they run a little bit large but are not too large to use. Will buy an 8 instead of 8.5 next time.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in CA

customer_reviews.title: Awful Fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is awful. The slipper isn't shaped like a foot it is just oval. So therefore it doesn't fit. Some places too wide even slips off the back of the heal. I tried retying the leather strap and that didn't work either. It is an terrible slipper and certainly not comfortable like you'd want a slipper to be.
customer_reviews.author: dianastasia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfy, perfect for an active lady!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers for my wife several years ago. She wears them in the house, doing all kinds of activities. She does not sit in front of the TV all day, watching daytime television and talking to friends on her cell phone. She is walking, moving, cooking, etc. With constant use and abuse these slippers have held up heroically. The fabric has not split. The seams are solid. The soles are in good shape. My wife reports that they remain comfortable. The slippers have not stretched out of shape. Overall these are good slippers made with quality materials. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Active Man

customer_reviews.title: Ordered three pairs. Only keeping one.
customer_reviews.text: So I read all the reviews saying to size up, so I did. I wear a size 6 so I ordered a 7 and they were WAY too big. So I returned those and ordered a 6.5 and those still were far too big. I returned those and bought a size 6. These are still a little loose, but they're wearable. They are super soft and comfy. Just beware of the strange sizing
customer_reviews.author: Redhead07

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other Minnetonka slippers and love them. I chose this style because it looked like the ones I have bought in the past, and it was less expensive. I could not wear them because they were too long and the toe "box" was short, so my feet would not stay in. I would have put up a better picture, but I returned them less than 24 hours after I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Slippers run as little looser than regular ones
customer_reviews.text: I had forgotten all about these in 2018, as I normally buy a pair every year/every other year. My favorite house shoe, or if I'm super lazy, bumming it outside when it's cold shoe. That being said, the fit on these are a bit looser than the regular Minnetonka shoes. Not length-wise, just width wise. Would not have ordered a different size regardless.
customer_reviews.author: einalem

customer_reviews.title: very different then last slipper!
customer_reviews.text: loved my last pair of slippers from your , this 1 is too loose in the back, too tight in the toe, you shortened the toe cover. It doesn't fit like my old ones! Sorry I thru them away! I will wear them but will not do this again! I need to go and buy another pair and give these away to ?????? VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THESE. LOVED MY LAST PAIR - WONDEFUL - YOU CHANGED SOMETHING!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bournique

customer_reviews.title: A few drawbacks but still a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: These originally felt too small and really rubbed the backs of my heels. I stuck it out & wore them for longer periods of time & they have stretched out to fit quite well. My feet get unusually hot in them but that's not a deal breaker, just take them off for a few seconds to make sure they don't get sweaty. The inside fuzz wears down fast but they are still comfortable and the soles seem to be holding up great so far. My biggest complaint would be that the leather strips come untied ALL.THE.TIME. I may just cut those off. But overall I still like these slippers & would probably buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: The first pair received had visibly been worn around someplace. The bottom was dirty and the inside was a bit matted. I called and discussed with customer support and a brand new pair arrived within 3 days. They fit wonderfully and my feet are happy, as am I with the customer support folks.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Raiford

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Minnetonkas. My first pair lasted 6 years. I was sad to let them go. They were the Chrissy style which has the lining come up and over the top of the slipper. This one, the Cally, is just as comfortable. Not as much faux lining as the Chrissy, but still does the job in keeping my feet comfy and warm. Great craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: EABH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing as they're very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the first pair of these back because one of the laces broke off immediately. The same thing happened on the second pair. Very frustrating. For whatever reason these don't seem to be made as well as they used to be. Disappointing as they're very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: Size down!
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift in my usual size of 7.5. They were much too large, so I exchanged them for a 7. They are still too wide, but I cannot size down further without risking them being much too short for my foot. I do love the look and feel otherwise. I just had to learn to walk more carefully around the house so I don’t kick them off.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mocs
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these Mocs enough that I ordered another pair in a different color. I have another pair of Minnetonka Mocs that are several years old & getting pretty worn but are still comfy. Looking forward to the same with these!
customer_reviews.author: BvR

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is whack
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item THREE times in attempt to get the right fit. Ordered a 9.5–way too big. Ordered an 8.5–too snug. Ordered a 9–STILL big. I’m not sure what is going on with these moccasins/slippers but the sizing is incredibly frustrating. To make matters more confusing, the actual retailer (Minnetonka) does not list half sizes on its website so I’m now not even sure the other sizes I tried were actually half sizes. After three strikes (four of you count the ten I tried from another seller which was only slight loose), I’m looking into another retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C

customer_reviews.title: Shoes just okay
customer_reviews.text: Size nine is a little big except in the toe. A little of the black color is rubbing off on the sides of my foot. They look great and leather does stretch out. I’m not as happy as the ones I previously pitched. My dog chewed them up and I need these badly. So, I’m keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Danna L. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just the case with me, but I was excited to finally have new slippers only to find that they are too small. I am universally a size 8 women's shoe and ordered these in an 8 and they are way too tight and my toes are shoved in the front. Don't know how true to size these are but they seem like nice slippers otherwise. Size issue is just really inconvenient. Maybe size up half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Ria & Dom de Souza

customer_reviews.title: Good old fashioned slipper
customer_reviews.text: I like: comfortable, quiet soles for night foraging , tightenable with circumferential shoe lace, good price. I'd like to see be willing to pay more for: more arch support, removable washable lining or insole.
customer_reviews.author: Adelite

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these moccasins for years and they are not the same quality as in the past. The inside fur is not black nor is it Sherpa. It’s a cheaper fur. Also the outside stitching isn’t good either. The quality control is off or they are a knock-off moccasin. I’m very disappointed. They are going back today.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Way too wide and would slip on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: The slipper is way too wide and I cannot wear them. I walk out of them, I would have sent them back but I tossed the information. Now they are cute and would have been warm. They are well made just really wide and no way to tighten them.
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are comfortable but run a little smaller than expected. They fit a little short but I'm sure they'll stretch a bit over time. Love the color and the softness of the inside. UPDATE: I’ve had these slippers for a little over 1 month and I’ve only worn them around my house and the bottoms are peeling apart. Very disappointing—my cheap slippers from Target lasted over 3 years longer.
customer_reviews.author: JAM0101

customer_reviews.title: Red is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these before and in the past got the 7-1/2 which were too big unless I wore them with socks. The 7 is much better but a little snug. I'm sure they will stretch a bit as the others did.
customer_reviews.author: Vita

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers. At first they felt a little tight in the toes and Ibwas worried that they would be uncomfortable. But soon they stretched out enough and now have that comfy slipper feeling..... ahhhhhh.
customer_reviews.author: Anzara

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these in different colors. The width is adjusted by just tightening the laces (they go all the way around). I wear these to go shopping on cold days and my feet thank me!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Massaro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, great price, I wear them everyday working from home on our tile floor. I think they are cute :) I wear a size 8 and I bought a 8.5 as i always find slippers to be too snug. the 8.5 fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Cp

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a house shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am so proud of these moccasins. They are great house shoes. The color is beautiful light pink and soft The inside soles are fluffy and thick. They keep your feet very warm. They are a high quality moccasin. No complaints. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

product_meta.title: Minnetonka Women's Cally Faux Fur Slipper
feature_bullets: TIMELESS STYLE: Minnetonka boasts a rich heritage that includes a tradition of careful craftsmanship since 1946, delivering excellent quality footwear using only the finest materials to provide comfort, durability, and timeless style with every step

COZY SHOE FIT: The women's moccasin slippers are made to stretch to the contours of your feet and wear pattern over time, ensuring that each pair of moccasin slippers fit snugly and getting more comfortable as you wear them

CONVENIENT SIZING: Each pair of moccasins slippers for women run true to size; refer to the convenient Size Chart icon to ensure correct sizing before purchasing; if your feet are different sizes, make sure to measure the larger one for the best fit

MORE THAN JUST REGULAR FOOTWEAR: The women's moccasin slippers are specially made constructed with suede leather and thick pile lining that that gives you an almost barefoot feel while keeping your feet perfectly warm

VERSATILE STYLE: You can choose from a variety of colors, from classic to modern, and ensure that each step will provide a rich look and feel, adding a dash of style to any wardrobe whether you're relaxing indoors or going about your day outdoors
